helloAction: What do you want to do
confirmStart:
Are you sure you want to send those images ? Selected folders are : 
  [SFW: %VAR%]
  [NSFW: %VAR%]
edit: Edit parameters (To do if it's your first time)
editIgnoredGuildsText: Select a server to remove it from the list, click on 'add a server' to ignore a new one
addIgnoredGuildText: Enter the name of the server to ignore (Leave blank to abandon)
editFolders: 🖼️ Edit the folders where to find the images
editFoldersTextSFW: Insert the entire path to your SFW folder (Leave empty to not change anything)
editFoldersTextNSFW: Insert the entire path to your NSFW folder (Leave empty to not change anything)
editBins: 🗑️ Edit the folders where to find the images who cannot be sent
editBinsTextSFW: Insert the entire path to your SFW bin folder (Leave empty to not change anything)
editBinsTextNSFW: Insert the entire path to your NSFW bin folder (Leave empty to not change anything)
editChannels: 🎤 Edit the name of the channels on which to send the images
editChannelsTextSFW: Insert the name of the channel where to send the SFW images (Leave empty to not change anything)
editChannelsTextNSFW: Insert the name of the channel where to send the NSFW images (Leave empty to not change anything)
folderDeletedSuccessfully: Folder %VAR% n°%VAR% has been successfully deleted.
channelIsMissing: 🤖 Mission cancelled, cannot found the channel named %VAR% in the server [%VAR%]
goodBye: 👋 Closing program, see you next time
